Twi_0.Line: Hello, Trixie. What brings you here today?

Responses.Twi_Greetings_1: Greetings, Sparkle. Trixie is just idling today.
Responses.Twi_Challenge_1: Trixie has come to challenge you, Sparkle!
Responses.Twi_About_Discord_1: What do you know about Discord?

Twi_Greetings_1.Line: Oh, okay. Just let me know if you need something.

Responses.Twi_About_Discord_1: What do you know about Discord?

Twi_Challenge_1.Line: What? Why do you have to do this all the time, Trixie?

Responses.Twi_About_Discord_1: Oh, never mind. What do you know about Discord?
